/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, lined with lush green trees, is filled with cars and buses, indicating a busy time of day. Modern buildings rise in the background, their glass and steel facades reflecting the overcast sky. The colors in the image are predominantly gray and green, with occasional splashes of red and blue adding vibrancy to the scene.
